news_header: Two private jets collided at Scottsdale Airport in Arizona, resulting in at least one death and several injuries.
news_original_title: US: Private jet collision in Scottsdale, Arizona, kills 1
news_text: On Monday, two private jets collided on the runway of Scottsdale Airport in Arizona, leading to at least one fatality and multiple injuries. A Learjet 35A veered off the runway after landing and struck a Gulfstream 200 business jet. Four individuals were reported injured, with two taken to trauma centers. The FAA is investigating the incident and has temporarily halted flights into the airport. This incident adds to a series of recent aviation accidents in the US.
